On Tue, Sep 03, 2002 at 10:19:24PM -0000, dph_of_rules wrote:
> Ok, there is some difference of opinion.  What I am talking about 
> is randomly placing objects on an existing map, with controls about 
> what type of objects are placed and the level numbers of said objects.

Ah, ok; I understand what you were saying now - I was talking about total map generation!

> we don't have the capacity to export 
> scenario maps into jpg or gif files.  Is anyone actually working on 
> making that capacity a reality?

OK well I haven't done much poking about in the code (I really should before I post this ;-) but since OpenGlad is using SDL, I assume 
therefore that everything is being drawn to SDL_Surface's.

Its easy enough to dump an SDL_Surface to a bitmap...

With SDL_Image you can probably dump it to just about any format you like ?

-Niall.
